channel.title: Disconnection + Exception when buying silab items
channel.description:
I updated all the item IDs, but now when i try to buy one, it disconnects, anyone know why?
Exception: [code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15195 at client.addItem(client.java:13059) at client.buyItem(client.java:27318) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19368) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14996) at client.process(client.java:14966) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:49) FrellScape Server [fatal] - exception[/code]

item.title: Disconnection + Exception when buying silab items
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Is, the arrays in class Item should be 20000 I think.

Read full topic

When you discconect that means the person you are trading with does not have silab it happened to me before.
btw item list here http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/output.txt
